translations: 跳华尔兹舞的人；游乐场的旋转游戏车

sentences.sentence: One of the academics Bloom emailed was Ken Waltzer, the professor of Jewish studies at 18 Michigan State University.
sentences.translation: 肯•沃尔兹是布鲁姆写邮件求助的学者之一，他是密歇根州立大学研究犹太人历史的教授。

sentences.sentence: Whether grey or blue skies lay overhead, the heft of the waves was always huge - sometimes rhythmic and pleasant, at others offering a waltzer of a voyage.
sentences.translation: 无论头顶上的天空是灰色还是蓝色，海上总是波涛汹涌——有时海浪富有节奏感而令人愉悦，有时我们的船就像在海浪上跳华尔兹舞。
